0.11.name: wordpress/bootstrap-for-wordpress
0.11.description:
Boost your site with the Twitter Bootstrap Javascript and CSS library.

-- Use the latest stable version or set your own custom CSS. -- -- Includes the Javascript bootstrap APIS -- -- Includes the jQuery dependencies file (incase your site does not have jQuery installed) --

---------------------- What is Twitter bootstrap ? ----------------------

------- From Twitter Bootstrap:

"Bootstrap is a toolkit from Twitter designed to kickstart development of webapps and sites. It includes base CSS and HTML for typography, forms, buttons, tables, grids, navigation, and more."

------- Why Bootstrap?

Designed for everyone, everywhere. Need reasons to love Bootstrap? Look no further.

Built for and by nerds Like you, we love building awesome products on the web. We love it so much, we decided to help people just like us do it easier, better, and faster. Bootstrap is built for you.

For all skill levels Bootstrap is designed to help p
